directions.step:
This recipe is from Taste of Home Garden-Fresh Recipes. Autumn 1987.
In a small bowl, combine butter, dill and lemon juice; mix until well blended. Form into a log. (if neccessary, refrigerate until mixture is firm enough to shape easily.) Wrap log in plastic wrap; freeze until firm. when ready to serve slice butter 1/4 in. thick and top hot asparagus. Yield: Recipe will season about 4 pounds of asparagus. Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by Aquasea221@aol.com on Aug 15, 1997
